text: Robert Gebhardt (20 September 1920 – 8 February 1986) was a German football player and manager. As a player, he won the 1948 German Championship with 1. FC Nürnberg. He also managed several Bundesliga clubs, returning to Nürnberg in 1978 after two years at MSV Duisburg and two at Werder Bremen. ==Other websites== * * Category:1920 births Category:1986 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:German football managers Category:SV Werder Bremen managers Category:Arminia Bielefeld managers Category:MSV Duisburg managers Category:Wacker Innsbruck managers
title: Robert Gebhardt
